description: This API enables you to invoke the interfaces defined on 'UserMenuService'.

operations.description: Invoke the method 'GetCurrentUserMenu' on this service.
Invoke the method 'UpdateCurrentUserMenu' on this service by specifying the payload 'Collection(UserMenuItem)' in the JSON format.
operations.example:
POST https://localhost:50000/b1s/v2/UserMenuService_UpdateCurrentUserMenu
{
    "UserMenuItems": [
        {
            "LinkedFormMenuID": "11",
            "LinkedFormNum": null,
            "LinkedObjKey": null,
            "LinkedObjType": null,
            "Name": "Forms",
            "Position": 1,
            "ReportPath": "11",
            "Type": "umitFolder"
        },
        {
            "LinkedFormMenuID": null,
            "LinkedFormNum": null,
            "LinkedObjKey": null,
            "LinkedObjType": null,
            "Name": "Reports",
            "Position": 2,
            "ReportPath": "",
            "Type": "umitFolder"
        },
        {
            "LinkedFormMenuID": null,
            "LinkedFormNum": null,
            "LinkedObjKey": null,
            "LinkedObjType": null,
            "Name": "Queries",
            "Position": 3,
            "ReportPath": "",
            "Type": "umitFolder"
        },
        {
            "LinkedFormMenuID": null,
            "LinkedFormNum": null,
            "LinkedObjKey": null,
            "LinkedObjType": null,
            "Name": "Links",
            "Position": 4,
            "ReportPath": "",
            "Type": "umitFolder"
        }
    ]
}

operations.description: Invoke the method 'GetUserMenu' on this service by specifying the payload 'UserMenuParams' in the JSON format.
Invoke the method 'UpdateUserMenu' on this service by specifying the payload 'UserMenuParams' in the JSON format.
